<!-- Style -->
<style>
body {
  background-color: #f9fafc;
  font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
  text-align: center;
  color: #333;
  margin: 0;
}

/* Main Section */
.intro-section { margin-top: 60px; }

/* Title */
.intro-section h1 {
  font-size: 2.6em;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: #3a5bcc;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fadeIn 1s ease forwards;
}

/* Profile Picture */
.profile-pic {
  width: 160px; height: 160px; border-radius: 50%;
  object-fit: cover;
  border: 4px solid #a7c7ff;
  box-shadow: 0 4px 10px rgba(150, 180, 255, 0.3);
  margin: 15px 0;
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fadeIn 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.4s;
}

/* Intro Line */
.intro-text {
  font-size: 1.1em; color: #555;
  margin: 15px auto 30px; max-width: 600px; line-height: 1.6;
  opacity: 0;
  animation: fadeIn 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.8s;
}

/* Explore Button */
.explore-button {
  background-color: #3a5bcc; color: #fff;
  padding: 12px 28px; border-radius: 8px; text-decoration: none; font-weight: 600;
  opacity: 0; display: inline-block;
  animation: fadeIn 1s ease forwards; animation-delay: 1.2s;
}
.explore-button:hover { background-color: #5f80ff; }

/* Animation */
@keyframes fadeIn {
  from { opacity: 0; transform: translateY(15px); }
  to   { opacity: 1; transform: translateY(0); }
}

/* Mobile */
@media (max-width: 600px) {
  .intro-section h1 { font-size: 2.2em; }
  .profile-pic { width: 130px; height: 130px; }
  .intro-text { font-size: 1em; padding: 0 15px; }
}
</style>
